title: Interpretation of seeing a car driving with a dead person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about driving a car with dead people: In a dream via the roy2a.com website, seeing driving a dead car in a dream indicates the fulfillment of desires, achieving goals, prosperity, and hearing good news. It also shows calm and psychological stability. In this article, we will explain the interpretation of seeing a car driving with dead people in a dream for a man, a single young man, an unmarried woman, as well as a married or divorced woman for some imams such as Imam Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Imam Al-Sadiq and other artists in the modern era, so follow us on the Roya website. What is the interpretation? Imam Ibn Shirin for a car driving a dead person in a dream? Dreaming about driving a dead car indicates longevity. Seeing a dead person driving a car in a dream means hearing good news. If an unmarried young man sees that the deceased is driving a car in a dream, this indicates the young man’s upcoming marriage. Seeing Riding a car with a dead father in a dream means abundance, wealth, prosperity, a safe and reassured life, and psychological peace. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a car driving a dead person in a dream for a single woman? Seeing a dead girl driving a car in a dream for a single woman means that she has overcome difficult stages And you will achieve what you want. Seeing a dead car breaking down in a dream means that she is committing transgressions and sins and that the dreamer will make many mistakes. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead car driving a car in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a dead person riding in a car, such as an uncle or paternal uncle, in a dream for a married woman indicates To freedom from worries and problems, the collapse of marital disputes, marital happiness and stability. Seeing a dead woman driving a car in a dream for a married woman means that she will hear good news. If a married woman sees that she is driving a car with a dead person and it collapses on the road in a dream, this indicates experiences And the difficulties that she faces in her life’s journey. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a car driving a dead person in a dream for a pregnant woman? A dream about a pregnant woman riding in a car with dead people indicates ease of childbirth, stopping pain and fatigue, and abundance of sustenance. If a pregnant woman sees that she She is riding in a car with her dead woman and it collapses on the road. This indicates the difficulty of childbirth and feelings of sadness and anxiety. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead woman driving a car in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing a divorced woman riding in a car with a deceased person in a dream indicates the collapse of worry and anxiety and the achievement of what she wants from her dreams and aspirations. It indicates Dreaming of driving a black car in a dream indicates good luck, status and power, and an old car indicates adversity and difficulties. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car repaired in a dream. What is the interpretation of dreaming of buying a dead car? If you see in a dream that you are buying a new car for the deceased, this indicates the end of family disputes And marital and good news and we wish you success. Seeing a dead person buying a new car means the end of sadness, joy and happy circumstances. If you see yourself buying a car for the deceased in a dream, this indicates that the dreamer’s affairs will be facilitated and his needs will be satisfied, and the white car appears

title: Interpretation of dreams: Death in a dream with different interpretations

preview.html: Dream interpretation of death in a dream has different interpretations. Death is one of the disturbing events that many fear will happen, and since the mind lives the situations that occur in dreams as if they were reality and is greatly affected by them until the moment comes. Waking up from sleep, dreams in which a death incident appears leave a lot of questions, anxiety and fear in the soul of God and can affect his soul. In this article we will learn together about the interpretation of dreams, death in a dream, different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing death in a dream When he sees If the dreamer himself dies in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will regret something important in his life. Also, when the dreamer sees himself dying and then comes back to life again in the dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will commit a sin and then repent to God Almighty. When the dreamer sees himself dying suddenly without getting sick in the dream, it may mean that the dreamer will The dream will have a long life. Also, when the dreamer sees himself dying in a dream and sees himself performing funerals, bathing, and gathering people, it may mean that the dreamer will spoil his religion. When the dreamer sees himself dying in a dream, and he sees himself performing funerals, bathing, and gathering people, it may mean that The dreamer will take over his worldly life. Also, when the dreamer sees himself dying in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness the corruption and destruction of his city. • When the dreamer sees himself dying in a dream without seeing the body, it may mean that the dreamer will demolish the wall of his house. Also, when the dreamer sees that he died in a dream but was buried, this may mean that the dreamer will not build that wall that was demolished. Interpretation of the dream of seeing death in a dream When the dreamer sees that a dead person he knows dies without crying or screaming in the dream, then he may This means that the dreamer will marry that person after that. Also, when the dreamer sees that a dead person he knows is dying and cries for him in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will achieve comfort. When the dreamer sees that a dead person he knows is dying in a dream, it may mean that the dreamer will witness the death of someone after that person dead. Also, when the dreamer sees that a dead person he knows dies again in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will witness the death of a member of that deceased’s family. Interpretation of the dream is to see a person who does not die in a dream When the dreamer sees that he has become a person who does not die In a dream, this may indicate the death of the dreamer or his approaching death. Also, when the dreamer sees that someone he knows does not die in a dream, this may indicate that this person has died and may die soon. • When the dreamer sees that he has become a deathless human being in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will shorten his life. Also, when the dreamer sees that he has become a person who never dies in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer will be killed for the sake of God. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the deceased in a dream When the dreamer sees

Interpretation of a dream of my father praying and crying in a dream. Seeing the father praying indicates goodness, God willing. Seeing the father praying in a dream indicates goodness and success, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees the father praying, this may be good news, and God knows best. If a divorced woman sees the father praying, this may be evidence of the father’s psychological stability, and God knows best. I know the unseen. Interpretation of a dream that my father disowns me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about my father disowning me in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see this. However, seeing a quarrel with the father could be a sign of mistakes that affect financial matters, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. If a married woman sees a quarrel with her father, she may It expresses selfishness, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees a quarrel with her father, this may be a sign of crises and problems that the girl faces in her life, and God knows everything that no one has seen. title: Interpretation of a dream about hearing the voice of the dead on the phone

preview.html: Here in today’s discussion, the interpretation of a dream about hearing the voice of the dead on the phone, we will present the interpretation of a dream about hearing the voice of the dead without seeing a married woman, as well as the interpretation of a dream about a phone call with the dead. The interpretation of a dream about a dead person speaking to me on the phone clearly and without any effort through the Greatest Dream Interpreter website, so follow us. Interpretation of hearing the voice of a dead person on the phone in a dream for a single girl: In the event that an unmarried woman sees herself dying in a dream and then wakes up. This may indicate that the dreamer has committed a wrong act, but she will regret it. If she sees a dead person in a dream, this may mean that the dreamer will get married Soon. It is possible that seeing the deceased in a dream is a sign of kindness and good news for a dieter soon. Either you will work in a special place or you will get a lot of money and more. If you see the deceased in a dream wearing green clothes. This vision foretells for the forerunner that the deceased will be blessed In Paradise. But if the dead person’s clothes were unclean or unkempt. It indicates that he was a sinful person and now needs alms. See also: Interpretation of the dead person’s chest in a dream. Interpretation of hearing the dead person’s voice on the phone in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees a dead person in a dream, then this The vision may indicate that there are many problems between her and her husband, which may lead them to separate. It is possible that she will see the death of her son in a dream, so that the dreamer will be able to triumph over her enemies. Seeing herself dying in a dream may be a sign that God It will grant the dreamer a long life. In case he actually saw a dead person dying again in a dream and cried for him without a sound in the dream. This heralds the end of her troubles and crises. If you see the deceased in a dream coming to ask her something, then this vision is not very promising. It may mean that the dreamer He loses money or loses someone in reality. Interpretation of hearing the voice of a dead person on the phone in a dream about a man and its meaning. If the dreamer witnesses the death of the imam of the mosque or the prince of his country. This is an unpleasant vision and may indicate that the dreamer’s country is exposed to ruin and destruction. If he sees a dead person in a dream, This vision may indicate that the dreamer may soon be separated from his wife. If the dreamer sees himself dead, naked, lying on the road. This vision may indicate that the dreamer may be exposed to poverty and lose everything he owns. It is possible that he saw himself dying in the dream. However, It is possible that the dreamer will be able to pay off all the debts he owes and this indicates that he will get money soon. If he sees a dead person coming and sitting with him in his house. This vision predicts that he will soon be freed from the crisis he was going through. Read also: Interpretation of a dream It gives dead bread to the living. The meaning of seeing a dead voice on the phone in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. If she sees herself dying in a dream, those around her also cry without a sound. This may be an indication that the visionary will undergo an easy and easy birth. And if she sees herself dying in a dream, this may mean that she will give birth A son, and God Almighty is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of seeing a road or path in a dream and its effects

preview.html: Interpretation of the street or road in a dream. Many people search online for various interpretations of the visions and dreams they see in their dreams. The interpretation of Ibn Sirin differs from the interpretation of Ibn Kathir, Ibn Shaheen, or Al-Nabulsi, and the dream also differs depending on the person, and here we will learn about the interpretation of seeing a road or road in a dream. Interpretation of crossing the street in a dream for a married woman. There are many meanings and clues to the interpretation of crossing the road for a married woman, and here are We put evidence for this: When a woman sees that she sees a righteous path, this indicates that she will get rid of the worries and problems present in her daily life. As for seeing a path with water, this indicates that she will achieve her desired goals and achieve her ambitions in life. When a lady sees trees in her dream, She will have good luck in her life. If a married woman sees a wide road in her dream, this means that she will get a lot of money. When a woman sees a road with water, this indicates that she will live happily and get food and goodness. See here: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a sun umbrella in A dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of seeing the road in a dream for a pregnant woman: Many pregnant women are afraid of dreams and visions for fear of pregnancy, so they search in many different sites, and here we will provide an explanation for that: When a pregnant woman sees the road and the road is narrow and difficult, this indicates that she will suffer from many hardships. Of the problems that she faces during her pregnancy, such as fatigue and stress. If a pregnant woman sees a wide road in the vision, this indicates that her affairs are good and will follow a healthy path and that her child is in good condition and in good health, and this is God and I know that. Then the pregnant woman when She sees a narrow road in her dreams, which means that she will be exposed to many dangers, and God knows best. See here: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a brother in a brother’s dream according to interpretation scholars. Interpretation of seeing crossing the street in a dream for a man. There are many differences in a man’s vision of the road from a woman’s vision of the road, as well as the vision of the fiancée. Here we provide an explanation of the vision of the road. A man crossing a road: When a man sees a crossing road in a dream, it means that he will achieve his desires, goals, and many things he desires. If an unmarried young man sees in his dream that he is crossing a road, this means that the young man loves a girl and wants to marry her and that they will meet soon. In addition In addition, when a man sees that he is crossing a road alone, this indicates that he will make new decisions in his life with different methods and ideas. Interpretation of seeing a street or road in a dream in detail When you see a highway and drive a car on it, this indicates that you will achieve goals in daily life. In While if he sees himself riding a luxury car and crossing the road, this indicates that he will have intermittent success in his life. But when you see that he is driving a car on a highway, this vision shows that he is a balanced person and his driving is good. And when you see a car racing on a highway, this indicates That his luck is good, and God knows best. The narrow road in the dream is

In While if he sees himself riding a luxury car and crossing the road, this indicates that he will have intermittent success in his life. But when you see that he is driving a car on a highway, this vision shows that he is a balanced person and his driving is good. And when you see a car racing on a highway, this indicates That his luck is good, and God knows best. The narrow road in the dream is

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a single woman, a married woman, and a man

preview.html: Compound numbers consisting of more than one number have other connotations and other meanings within the dream, and today we will talk about the number 30 in the dream and its most important interpretations, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in one dream. The only girl who sees the number 30 in her dream. It shows that he thinks a lot about his age and what he does. Seeing this number also means that the girl is thinking carefully about what she will do in her next life, and God knows best. When a single girl sees this number in a dream, it may appear that she is thinking about marriage because she is afraid that she will grow old without getting married. If she sees the unique number 30 in a dream It could be a sign of many obstacles and problems. This girl faces in her next life, and God knows best. There is an interpretation of this vision by an unmarried girl. He wants to get married because he is afraid of growing old without getting married. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a young man. When a single young man sees the number 30 in a dream. This vision may be a warning to him that his life is passing. He has not done the important things, so he has to recalculate. Perhaps seeing the number 30 in the dream of one young man. The expression of what is coming in his life will not be the same as the time that has passed. It must To start a new life. Seeing the number 30 also indicates that this person has reached the age of majority. And that there is a new life to live. But you must focus on the best things and the right and sound ways. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 32 in a dream and what the number 32 indicates. Interpretation Seeing the number 30 in a dream for a man. The man who sees the number 30 in his dream. It is an expression of the presence of many things in his life. That you must focus on and see well. This vision also expresses that the dreamer has a personality capable of balancing things. They have the power of expression and a conscious mind. Seeing the number 30 for a man also shows the extent of his love for this man. And their interest in his opinion and advice for them in many situations and on many topics. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in the dream of a divorced woman. A divorced woman when she dreams of the number 30 in a dream. An expression that gains great livelihood for the presence of her children whom she cares for and protects. Seeing this The number expresses great goodness that exists within her home and in her life in general. This vision may be an expression of the extent of her care and love for her children. Interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a dream for a pregnant woman. The pregnant woman who sees the number 30 in a dream. It is a sign that she will spend her pregnancy period quietly. And that she will give birth. She gave birth easily, and God Almighty knows best. Seeing the number 30 in a pregnant woman’s dream. The number 3 expresses the periods of pregnancy divided into three periods. The number zero expresses the beginning of a new life. Seeing the number 30 in a dream for a married woman. A married woman when she sees the number 30 in a dream. Express It will be shipped soon. And that her heart will be filled with happiness because of this pregnancy, God willing. Seeing the number 30 in a dream is evidence that she will spend her life with her husband. And that she will live in a state of friendship and understanding between her and her husband, and God knows best. This vision may be an expression of improving her living conditions. And that he will have a livelihood. Her husband will increase in the coming seasons, and God knows best. There is another interpretation of seeing the number 30 in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign

title: Interpretation of seeing flying insects in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html:
I like itFansSubscribedFansInterpretation of seeing flying insects in a dream by Ibn SirinThe interpretation of seeing flying insects in a dream varies depending on the person who sees them and their marital status, whether married, single, or divorced, but in the end most insects remain annoying and hateful creatures, and often seeing them in a dream has a bad meaning and meaning. Seeing flying insects in a dream according to Ibn Sirin sees it as a sign that the one who saw the dream will be sad and in trouble. If one sees in a dream, many insects staying in his house, this indicates that the people around him are envious and envious of him. Whoever saw an insect in a dream fell on him and hit him, it is not good news. Rather, it is a warning to face major problems caused by the presence of some negative people in his life. But whoever sees what he has misunderstood, this does not harm him, because it indicates a lack of control over the negative characters in the dreamer’s life.
However, if the voyant is a married man and a small insect flies on his son, it is an accident that prevents the loss of the woman’s surroundings and an advertising problem in general. Interpretation of a dream about flying insects for a girl One interpretation of the vision only: Flying insects in a dream are a harbinger of sadness and anxiety. Another interpretation of this vision is that the shrewd man went through a failed marriage and faced many marital problems that may lead to divorce. If he sees flying insects chasing her while she is trying to get away from them, this is evidence of success in her life. Interpretation of the vision: Insects An airplane is a sign of evil, and as for an unmarried woman seeing lice in a dream, it means that her morals are good and her intentions are strong. But seeing insect reptiles is a bad omen, as the matter may be related to his marriage to a person who does not fear God in his life and does not adhere to his religion. Everyone who sees an attack by flying insects On her is a sign of her confrontation with a strong, immoral enemy. Interpretation of seeing insects and cleaning the house from them. Seeing harmful insects in a dream, like seeing evil people in reality, if a girl sees them, this is a warning to her about the company of evil people. Who do you see? Insect bites This means that there is another woman competing to win the heart of someone You love and you have to be careful. For unmarried women, seeing insects standing on their clothes means beingware of those around them who are in a bad mood. As for the vision? Cleaning the house of insects is a harbinger of getting rid of sadness and anxiety in one’s life. Interpretation of a dream about flying insects for a pregnant womanInterpretation of the visionFlying insects in A pregnant woman dreams, facing difficult times during her pregnancy, as well as the possibility of a difficult birth. For a pregnant woman to dream of running away from insects is a good omen that she will give birth easily, God willing. See the point Pregnant: Flying insects in their dreams indicate the possibility of things they have never thought of and never thought about If a pregnant woman sees killing insects in a dream, this is good news about the end of her fears, the disappearance of pain, and a change in her life for the better. Interpretation of a dream about flying insects for a married woman. Interpretation of the vision: flying insects.

title: Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about eggs for a single woman: Seeing raw eggs in an unmarried girl’s dream could be a sign of failure in an engagement or in an emotional relationship, and God knows best. Seeing a girl collecting eggs in her dream indicates an unstable and unstable love relationship. Seeing boiled and fried eggs in a dream is news of her marriage Or her imminent engagement, and God knows best. Interpretation of boiled eggs in a dream for an unmarried woman is one of the good visions that indicate goodness, livelihood, success, success, and progress on the front, and God knows best. Seeing eggs being given away in an unmarried woman’s dream is evidence of the arrival of goodness, livelihood, and benefit, and God knows best. Interpretation of a vision. Eggs in a dream for a married woman: Seeing boiled eggs in a dream for a married woman is imminent news of her pregnancy, and God knows best. Seeing a married woman peeling her eggs in her dream indicates sustenance, goodness, and blessings in the woman’s life for her and her husband, and God knows best. Also, seeing raw and broken eggs in a married woman’s dream indicates The problems she faces in her married life, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing eggs in a dream for a pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about collecting a lot of eggs for a pregnant woman indicates kindness, nourishment, and blessing in her life and the life of her husband. Seeing boiled eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of kindness, nutrition, and good health for her and her fetus. And God knows best. Seeing raw or broken eggs in a pregnant woman’s dream could be a sign of a problem for her and indicates exhaustion and hardship. Also, when a pregnant woman sees in her dream a chicken laying eggs, this is good news that she will give birth to a child, and God knows what is in the wombs. Eggs in A dream for a man: Seeing a man in a dream stealing eggs means a great loss in money and work, and God knows best. Also, seeing a man throwing eggs in the air in his dream could herald good news, livelihood, money, and children, and God knows best. Seeing egg yolks in a dream. The interpretation of seeing egg yolks in a dream is One of the visions that indicates a rational, conscious woman, the ability to endure and control things. Seeing yourself eating egg yolks in a dream also indicates kindness and good nutrition, which is a sign of prosperity in life and a happy life. Buying eggs in a dream A person seeing himself in a dream buying plates of eggs Healthy in a dream is one of the promising visions of the arrival of good nutrition, abundance and money. Seeing yourself buying broken eggs in a dream is a sign of marrying a corrupt and disabled woman and also indicates the end of relationships. Distributing eggs in a dream Seeing yourself distributing eggs to people in a dream indicates love and relationship. Kindness, the strength of religion, and good morals. Interpretation of seeing someone distributing eggs in a dream and experiencing great joy and happiness. Seeing yourself distributing cooked eggs in a dream is one of the good dreams that have many meanings of goodness and many blessings. Distributing eggs in a dream: Seeing eggs being thrown to a group Of people in a dream indicates bad words and unrighteous actions coming from the dreamer. Giving eggs in a dream If giving

title: What is the interpretation of a tooth decaying in a dream by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a tooth in a dream: It is one of the dreams that has many connotations and symbols that vary between good and evil. Some believe that seeing a tooth in a dream is, in most visions, a sign of worry and anxiety, but interpretation scholars have confirmed that there are some interpretations that portend good. Interpretation of a tooth in a dream: When the dreamer sees a broken and splintered tooth in a dream, this indicates the long life he will enjoy, and the vision Also good for good health and recovery from illness, but if he sees the tooth broken and falling into pieces on the ground, the dreamer will lose one of his close relatives. A person dreams of a tooth that was crushed and a lot of blood fell from it, then this indicates the loss of a lot of money, and if he works in a job In a company, then the decay of a tooth and its appearance of blood is evidence of losing work due to some haters. If a man is married and his wife is pregnant and he sees in a dream a tooth that has been crushed, this indicates raising a good male child who has a high status in society and whose future is bright and wonderful. Interpretation of a tooth in A dream by Ibn Sirin: If the dreamer sees in a dream that a tooth collapses and falls into a room and begins to collect every piece of it, then this indicates that someone close to him will contract the disease, but in the event that the tooth falls out and crumbles without bleeding, this indicates kindness and extensive nourishment. As for tooth decay with the eruption of Blood and the feeling of severe pain are evidence of the trouble that the fortuneteller falls into when he sees the married tooth falling and crumbling, but he was able to catch it. This indicates that he will lose one of his children in the coming period. Interpretation of a tooth in a dream for a single woman. Seeing an unmarried girl breaking her tooth in a dream is evidence of longevity. Age, and if the tooth falls out after it shatters in her hand, this is an indication of the abundant money that she will obtain, but in the case of a girl. The splintering of the lower molar is a sign of extreme anguish and sadness. Also, dreaming of a girl’s molar and months of severe disintegration pain indicates the failure of the emotional relationship she is living with a young man whom she loved very much. But if the molar falls out after it was splintered in her hand, then this is one of the praiseworthy visions that foretells her imminent engagement. A young man with good character. Seeing an engaged girl in a dream that she has her tooth pulled out and it undergoes chipping, spoils the engagement. Interpretation of a dream about an unmarried woman’s front tooth decay. Ibn Sirin says that seeing the front teeth chipped in an unmarried woman’s dream indicates problems between her and her family. The front teeth usually crumble Such an annoying sight. If an unmarried woman sees her father’s front teeth chipped in a dream, this is evidence of his separation, and when her lover’s front teeth are chipped in a fiancé’s dream, this may indicate the beginning of a major quarrel with him, which he leads to. Breaking off a relationship, canceling an engagement, and breaking the upper teeth in the front jaw, this could indicate the lack of a bond in a girl’s dream. Interpretation of a dream about a decaying fang for a single woman: Ibn Sirin says that seeing the upper fangs disintegrating without feeling pain in a woman’s dream indicates the dreamer’s long life, but if If the dreamer bleeds, he may lose someone close to her. It can symbolize bleeding

preview.html: Many people are currently searching for the meaning of the dream of the tube in detail with the presentation of all other information related to this topic, which is part of the noble verse in the Almighty’s saying “They said” Dreams are a pile of dreams “in all kinds of dreams that the sleeper sees, you may also be interested in the dream of a baby, in addition to learning a lot of other information on this topic, continue to learn more. Read also: Talking to the dead in a dream The meaning of false dreams The meaning of false dreams Read also: Penguin in a dream The word “Agath” is the plural of “Agatha”, and it means the combination of all the grasses mixed together. . The meaning of the word dreams of the tube, mixed dreams or lies in a dream, and the word “dream bubbles” was mentioned in the surah in the Almighty’s saying: “They said dreams, and we do not interpret dreams with workers.” Read also: Seeing 500 riyals in a dream What to do when you dream of a tube The Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, mentioned what a woman should do if she sees a dream that she does not like, and this is in the hadith of the companion Abd al-Rahman bin Awf on the authority of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. The Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: If I see a dream that makes me sick, he said: I met a father. And he, may God bless him and grant him peace, said: Change does not harm him. The hadith explained several points that must be done when experiencing these dreams, including the following: That the dreamer asks for God's help from the cursed devil. He must also advance to his left three times. Move to the other side of the sleeper. It is recommended that he pray two times. It is also necessary not to talk about this vision or try to explain it. This is what false dreams mean and what you should do when you see these dreams as well. Read also: Interpretation of the dream of the Day of Resurrection in a dream by Al-Nabulsi Types of what the sleeper sees There are many dreams that the sleeper may see during his sleep and they were mentioned in full in the hadith of Abu Hurairah, may God be pleased with him, on the authority of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. On him - he said: (Dreams are three, one is true, and the person addresses himself, and the dream of the devil is sad, so whoever sees what he does not like, let him get up and pray, he used to say: I love chains and hate chains: steadfastness in religion. He said: Whoever sees me, it is me, so the devil has no right to imitate me. And he said: Do not tell the dream except to a scholar or advisor. Accordingly, the types mentioned in the hadith are as follows: The dream: Its source is from God Almighty and in it is something that the dreamer loves and finds good or a guess. And the dream: Its source is the accursed devil whose goal is to frighten the dreamer by seeing disturbing or frightening things that he does not like, whether they are related to him or from a relative of his. The hadith of the soul: This is for the dreamer to see what happened to him in his day. The difference between dreams, dreams and visions There are three types of dreams that a person sees during his sleep, which are dreams, visions and false dreams. The vision is the vision of the God of things that he loves. The vision comes from God Almighty. It is often good news or it can be a warning sign of evil. Or come as a sign of help. As for the dream It is represented by seeing something unpleasant in a dream, and it is always from Satan, and it is recommended that the dreamer seek refuge in God from it.

Read also: Interpretation of a dream about the Day of Resurrection in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi Types of what the sleeper sees There are many dreams that the sleeper may see While he was sleeping, it was mentioned in full in the hadith of Abu Hurairah, may God be pleased with him, on the authority of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace. Accordingly - he said: (Dreams are three, one is true, and a person addresses himself, and the dream of Satan is sad, so whoever sees what he does not like, let him get up and pray. He used to say: I love chains and I hate chains: steadfastness in religion. He said: Whoever sees me is me, and Satan does not have the right to imitate me. He said: Do not tell the dream except to a scholar or advisor. Accordingly, the types mentioned in the hadith are as follows: The dream: its source is from God Almighty and it contains something that the dreamer loves and finds good or a guess. The dream: its source is the accursed Satan, whose goal is to frighten the dreamer by seeing disturbing or disturbing things. A frightening one that he does not like, whether it is related to him or from a relative. Soul talk: This is for the dreamer to see what happened to him during his day. The difference between dreams, dreams, and visions. There are three types of dreams that a person sees during his sleep, which are dreams, visions, and false dreams. A vision is Seeing the God of things that you love. The vision comes from the Almighty God, it is often good news or it can be a warning sign of evil or come as a sign of help. As for the dream, it represents seeing something unpleasant in the dream, and it is always from the devil, and it is enacted that the dreamer. May God seek refuge in me
